text: ArcelorMittal is an Indian-Luxembourgish multinational corporation with its headquarters in Luxembourg City. It was formed in 2006 when Arcelor was taken over by Mittal Steel."World's Biggest Steelmaker Raising $3 Billion As Profits Plunge". It produces more steel than any other company in the world, with a yearly steel production of 97 million metric tonnes. In 2009, it was ranked at 120th in the Fortune Global 500 of the world's largest corporations. == References == Category:2006 establishments in Luxembourg Category:Charleroi Category:Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange Category:Companies of India Category:Companies based in Luxembourg City
title: ArcelorMittal
